csl_wdtAux.h File Reference

This is the WDT Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the WDT Module. More...

Detailed Description

This is the WDT Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the WDT Module.
